meanings.sent1: She actualized her dream of becoming a doctor by working hard in school.
meanings.sent2: The artist actualized her vision by painting a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: He actualized his plan to travel the world by saving money for years.
meanings.sent4: The architect actualized the building design, turning it from a drawing into a real structure.
meanings.sent5: The chef actualized her recipe for the perfect chocolate cake, delighting her customers.

meanings.sent1: The scientist actualized a new invention that revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent2: The author actualized a magical world in her fantasy novel.
meanings.sent3: The magician actualized a rabbit out of a hat, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: The entrepreneur actualized a successful business from a simple idea.
meanings.sent5: The gardener actualized a beautiful garden by planting colorful flowers and lush greenery.
